Package com.esri.gpt.framework.sql

Database access objects and JDBC connection utility classes.

See:
          Description

Interface Summary
IClobMutator Provides mechanizm to access CLOB data.
 

Class Summary
BaseDao Super-class for a database access object.
ConnectionBroker Primary interface for accessing JDBC connection resources.
DatabaseReference Configuration reference for a database.
DatabaseReferences DatabaseReference collection.
ExpressionBinder Aids in the process of binding variables to SQL expressions.
HttpExpressionBinder Aids in the process of binding HTTP request parameters to SQL expressions.
ManagedConnection Acts as a wrapper for a JDBC connection.
ManagedConnections ManagedConnection collection.
TransactionCounter Manages the transaction count for a multi-edit transaction.
 

Exception Summary
DatabaseException A database related runtime exception.
 

Package com.esri.gpt.framework.sql Description

Database access objects and JDBC connection utility classes.
